# tokenType

**Type**

The type of an external purchase custom link token.

## Declaration

```swift
string tokenType
```

### Discussion

The token type field is present only for custom link tokens. For more information on tokens, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/StoreKit/receiving-and-decoding-external-purchase-tokens].

## External purchase token fields

- **externalPurchaseId**: The field of an external purchase token that uniquely identifies the token.
- **tokenCreationDate**: The field of an external purchase token that contains the UNIX date, in milliseconds, when the system created the token.
- **tokenExpirationDate**: The field of a custom link token that contains the UNIX date, in milliseconds, when the token expires.
